casebody.data:
No. 09-7800. Augustine Rizzo, Petitioner v. David Rock, Superintendent, Great Meadow Correctional Facility. 559 U.S. 963, 130 S. Ct. 1508,

176 L. Ed. 2d 152,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 1050. February 22, 2010.

Motion of petitioner to defer consideration of the petition for writ of certiorari denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
